text: I always assumed with these kinds of deals that they don't want you to share your secret model, or to share their model with you - what they're looking for is people competent/experienced at all the surrounding systems such as data capture, reporting, trade execution etc. All of that stuff is quite time consuming and treated as a boring distraction by some people. I agree it seems unworkable if there's any intention of sharing algorithms/strategies without profit share.

elements.text: I always assumed with these kinds of deals that they don't want you to share your secret model, or to share their model with you - what they're looking for is people competent/experienced at all the surrounding systems such as data capture, reporting, trade execution etc. All of that stuff is quite time consuming and treated as a boring distraction by some people. text:
It does sound as though the call is for experienced programmers / technicians of trading systems (e.g. with experience from the finance industry) rather than necessarily successful developers of betting strategies. Of the 1447 members in this group, it's unlikely everyone is big time successful in their betting systems. Perhaps there are a lot of aspiring people or those interested in getting into the industry, who haven't “cracked it” yet but have the right techie background. 

I think in a previous discussion we did talk about what it takes to be successful at this game, and dev or maths skills aren't all that you necessarily need. So perhaps there are quite a few people that fall into that group.

text: There's nothing wrong with a 'proper job' especially Imo for someone early in their work life.  Regular good money, training, paid hols, pension, travel, opportunities you didn't expect, and the ability to get a mortgage.  Eventually staff, long lunches, respect and a pretty easy ride...... Where's the application form? :grin:

text: <@UEA14GBRR> If you're capable of getting a job that makes you happy, then there's nothing wrong with it. But unfortunately a lot of people struggle to get there. Hence people taking a short at side-incomes such as Betfair trading.
